participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Alex loves incorporating her love for dogs into her design work.
participant_1.background: I have a powerful computer with a large screen for working on my designs. I work at the deli counter. I love the snow. I work as a lifeguard during summer and help out at my family's restaurant during the off season. I have three dogs.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Playful and observant, Jordan enjoys a quiet life and has a strong passion for dogs and unique interests.
participant_2.background: I haven't told my parents that I'm secretly training my collie to race. I am a huge fan of dogs. I'm still trying to figure out if my car is sentient or not. I can tell right away if I'm going to like someone. I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

content.text: Hi there, I'm in the process of designing a new logo for my dog's daycare.
Hi, I love dogs! I'm secretly training my collie to race.
That's awesome! What kind of collie?
I love border collies! They're so smart.
They are! They're also very high energy, so it's important to give them a lot of exercise.
I know, I have three dogs myself.
Oh wow! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever, a labrador retriever, and a german shepherd.
Those are all great breeds! I've always wanted a golden retriever.
They're great dogs! They're so friendly and loving.
I can imagine! They're always smiling in pictures.
They are! They're always happy to see you.
I'm sure your dogs love you very much.
They do! I'm their favorite person in the world.
I bet! I'm sure they're always excited to see you.
They are! They always run to the door when they hear my car pull up.
That's so cute! I love dogs.
